title: Reacher Season 3 Villains Let Loose: On an Evil Scale of 1 to 10, Who’s a ‘12′?
description: Reacher in Season 3 of the Prime Video hit has his XL hands full with not one or two but three different bad guys. Who is the foulest of them all? Short of having a mirror, mirror on the wall handy, TVLine posed that question to Reacher Season 3 co-stars Anthony Michael Hall (Bosch), Olivier […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: TVLine Items: Hawaii Five-0 Vet Joins Silicon Valley Series, Love Is Blind Reunion Date and More
description: Meaghan Rath has found a techy new role. The Hawaii Five-0 vet has joined AMC and AMC+’s untitled Silicon Valley series, starring Billy Magnussen (Made for Love) and Sarah Goldberg (Barry), our sister site Deadline reports. The forthcoming show — from writer and showrunner Jonathan Glatzer (Succession, Bad Sisters, Better Call Saul) — is set inside the bubble […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Dark Winds to Enthrall Viewers Through 2026 Thanks to Very Early Season 4 Renewal
description: AMC has officially renewed Dark Winds for Season 4, and the first premiere details are already here! Get the scoop inside. The post Dark Winds to Enthrall Viewers Through 2026 Thanks to Very Early Season 4 Renewal appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: Chicago PD Season 12 Episode 14 Spoilers: The Zoe/Serial Killer Case Makes a Chilling Return
description: Ruzek juggles more than can handle on Chicago PD Season 12 Episode 14 when Zoe is abducted and Disco Bob's condition declines. Our spoilers! The post Chicago PD Season 12 Episode 14 Spoilers: The Zoe/Serial Killer Case Makes a Chilling Return appeared first on TV Fanatic.
